lead_paragraph: KELLY--Ellsworth. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our beloved colleague, an artist who did indeed achieve his goal to "get at the rapture of seeing" and whose works will indeed fulfill his wish that they exist "forever in the present." 1/3
